channel.title: SkyLearn Pre-Filter Test Feed – New Batch
channel.description: Ten new mixed articles for validation of keyword-based pre-filter

item.title: Knight Frank relocates London HQ to newly refurbished Mayfair offices
item.description: The property consultancy has moved its headquarters to 20 Hanover Square after a major refurbishment project.

item.title: Taylor Swift confirms surprise performance at Royal Albert Hall
item.description: The global superstar announced an intimate one-night-only show as part of her UK charity tour.

item.title: Legal & General secures 10-year lease with fintech firm in Reading
item.description: The investment group has agreed a long-term lease with a growing fintech occupier at its Green Park development.

item.title: BBC announces new documentary on British wildlife
item.description: The six-part series, narrated by David Attenborough, explores rewilding projects across the UK.

item.title: WeWork relocates key London operations to smaller office footprint
item.description: The flexible workspace provider has downsized to 80,000 sq ft at Shoreditch Exchange amid restructuring efforts.

item.title: Manchester City crowned Premier League champions for fifth consecutive year
item.description: City sealed the title following a 3–0 victory over Chelsea, extending their dominance in English football.

item.title: BT Group consolidates offices with major move to Birmingham city centre
item.description: BT has announced it will relocate 2,000 employees into the newly completed Snowhill Three development by early 2026.

item.title: Love Island stars announce engagement during Maldives holiday
item.description: The couple shared the news with fans on Instagram after a sunset proposal on the beach.

item.title: Blackstone opens new European logistics headquarters in Amsterdam
item.description: Blackstone has unveiled its new European logistics HQ to support rapid expansion across the continent.

item.title: Marvel confirms next Avengers film release date for 2027
item.description: The studio revealed the sequel’s title and teased returning cast members during its D23 Expo presentation.
